entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
